remarks: The set of all lattice translations for a lattice ` K ` .  (Contributed by NM, 11-May-2012.)
statement:
ltrnset.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
ltrnset.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
ltrnset.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
ltrnset.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
ltrnset.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
ltrnfset $p |- ( K e. C -> ( LTrn ` K ) = ( w e. H |-> { f e. ( ( LDil ` K ) ` w ) | A. p e. A A. q e. A ( ( -. p .<_ w /\ -. q .<_ w ) -> ( ( p .\/ ( f ` p ) ) ./\ w ) = ( ( q .\/ ( f ` q ) ) ./\ w ) ) } ) ) $.
$d A p q $.
$d H w $.
$d K f p q w $.
